Description: · Min. 2 Years of Experience as Admin in *Real Estate Brokerage*.· Oversee Portal requirements & listing updates on (propertyfinder etc). Well Versed with Property Finder Portal.· Act as a point of contact among clients, employees, senior level executives & external agencies.· Manage the information flow in a timely & accurate manner.· Manage senior level executives’ calendars & meetings.· Make travel & accommodation arrangements as required.· Keep a track of daily expenses, and prepare weekly, monthly or quarterly reports as required.· Oversee the performance of the agents & prepare a monthly report.· Act as an office manager by keeping up with the office supply inventory.· Make information for internal & external communications – memos, emails, presentations, reports.· Take minutes during meeting.· Screen & direct phone calls & distribute the calls among required employee or senior level executive.· Organize & maintain the office filing system.· Draft lease, pre-sale, property listing agreements.· Preferably on family visa / visa with NOC.Skills
